languages.text: "Подобен яркому и всесжигающему лучу пусть будет путь вершащих Волю его. Да проляжет он во всякой тьме, препятствующей им".
"May the path of those who enact His will be as a radiant ray, an all-consuming inferno of light. May that ray pierce whatever darkness hinders their progress."
languages.original_text: "Подобен яркому и всесжигающему лучу пусть будет путь вершащих Волю его. Да проляжет он во всякой тьме, препятствующей им".

traits.locale_text: "May the path of those who exact His Will be as a ray of bright light that incinerates all. May that ray pierce whatever darkness hinders their progress."
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "May the path of those who exact His Will be as a ray of bright light that incinerates all. May that ray pierce whatever darkness hinders their progress."
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "May the path of those who exact His will be as a radiant ray, an all-consuming inferno of light. May that ray pierce whatever darkness hinders their progress."
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "May the path of those who enact His will be as a radiant ray, an all-consuming inferno of light. May that ray pierce whatever darkness hinders their progress."
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "May the path of those who enact His will be as a radiant ray, an all-consuming inferno of light. May that ray pierce whatever darkness hinders their progress."
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

traits.locale_text: "May the path of those who enact His will be as a radiant ray, an all-consuming inferno of light. May that ray pierce whatever darkness hinders their progress."
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: «Que el camino de quienes cumplen con Su voluntad sea como un rayo de luz radiante, un infierno luminoso y abrasador. Y que ese rayo penetre las tinieblas que dificulten su avance».
languages.original_text: "May the path of those who enact His will be as a radiant ray, an all-consuming inferno of light. May that ray pierce whatever darkness hinders their progress."

traits.locale_text: «Que el camino de quienes cumplen con Su voluntad sea como un rayo de luz radiante, un infierno luminoso y abrasador. Y que ese rayo penetre las tinieblas que dificulten su avance».
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: “遵循祂的旨意之人，愿他们的道路化为耀光，化为焚尽万物的明亮烈焰，穿透一切阻碍前进的黑暗。”
languages.original_text: "May the path of those who enact His will be as a radiant ray, an all-consuming inferno of light. May that ray pierce whatever darkness hinders their progress."

traits.locale_text: “遵循祂的旨意之人，愿他们的道路化为耀光，化为焚尽万物的明亮烈焰，穿透一切阻碍前进的黑暗。”
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: « Que la voie de ceux qui concrétisent Sa volonté soit tel un rayon de lumière aveuglante qui transperce les ténèbres barrant leur chemin. »
languages.original_text: "May the path of those who enact His will be as a radiant ray, an all-consuming inferno of light. May that ray pierce whatever darkness hinders their progress."

traits.locale_text: « Que la voie de ceux qui exécutent Sa volonté soit tel un rayon de lumière aveuglante qui transperce les ténèbres barrant leur chemin. »
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: 「御心に適う者の歩む道が、輝く一筋の光、すべてを焼き尽くす光の地獄でありますように。その光線が、彼らの歩みを妨げるいかなる闇をも貫きますように」
languages.original_text: "May the path of those who enact His will be as a radiant ray, an all-consuming inferno of light. May that ray pierce whatever darkness hinders their progress."

traits.locale_text: 「御心に適う者の歩む道が、輝く一筋の光、すべてを焼き尽くす光の地獄でありますように。その光線が、彼らの歩みを妨げるいかなる闇をも貫きますように」
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "Möge der Pfad all derer, die seinen Willen umsetzen, einem hellen Strahl gleichen, einem alles verschlingenden Inferno des Lichts. Möge dieser Strahl jede Dunkelheit durchbrechen, die ihren Fortschritt behindert."
languages.original_text: "May the path of those who enact His will be as a radiant ray, an all-consuming inferno of light. May that ray pierce whatever darkness hinders their progress."

traits.locale_text: "Möge der Pfad all derer, die seinen Willen umsetzen, einem hellen Strahl gleichen, einem alles verschlingenden Inferno des Lichts. Möge dieser Strahl jede Dunkelheit durchbrechen, die ihren Fortschritt behindert."
traits.speaker: Chorda_Companion

languages.text: "O'nun isteklerini yerine getirenlerin yolu, her şeyi tüketen ışıkla aydınlansın. O ışık, ilerleyişi engelleyen karanlığı delip geçsin."
languages.original_text: "May the path of those who enact His will be as a radiant ray, an all-consuming inferno of light. May that ray pierce whatever darkness hinders their progress."
